article.class: post-1406 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-acpa ast-article-single

p.strong: Below are links that provide information on how ACPA is continuing to serve our students and families during the Coronavirus pandemic. This information is also being shared with students and families through E-mail communication. If you are not receiving email communication, please email shinabery@artcollegeprep.org!

p.a: Most Recent Message from our Executive Director, Mr. Gatto (4/21/20)
